CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 3, 1956, pg. A17 reads: "Red Cross Drive - Comes Sunday, March 4, this group of Hill Top matrons will do a door-to-door canvassing job in interest of the Red Cross.  The hours of 2 to 4 have been set aside for the RC March.  Pictured, Mrs. Sarah Robinson, Mrs. William G. Nunn Jr., Mrs. George W. Shields, chairman; Mrs. Charles Hampton and Mrs. Robert Ogborn. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Red Cross drive members: Sarah Robinson, Frances Bell Nunn, Mrs. George W. Shields, Mrs. Charles Hampton, and Mrs. Robert Ogborn, posed in interior with three small framed pictures hung at an angle on wall
